subject: Order SSN4647
description_text:
Hi that was the wrong parcel. This include only the buildplate. Here is the order wirh the plus x pedals. You write me that the new parcel will be sent with dhl and the package will arrive before christmas. So check it 

Regard

Zeches Laurent

conversations.body_text: Hi Laurent Zeches,             We apologize for the delay; the DeCang pedals are temporarily out of stock. Your order is expected to begin delivery next week.
